incidents.title: 31 Traffic Accident Involving an External Party
incidents.description: Following a traffic obstruction, varying intervals are occurring on line 31.

incidents.title: 6: Police Operation
incidents.description: Tram line 6 is currently only able to operate irregularly in both directions due to a police operation.

incidents.title: 2 Traffic Accident
incidents.description: Due to a traffic accident in the Schubertring # Johannesgasse area, line 2 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Friedrich-Engels-Platz. The disruption is expected to last until 18:20.

incidents.title: 12A Traffic Accident Involving an External Party
incidents.description: Due to an external traffic accident in the Minciostraße area, line 12A is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Schmelz, Gablenzgasse. The disruption is expected to last until 17:40.

incidents.title: 42 Wrongly Parked Vehicle
incidents.description: Due to a wrongly parked vehicle in the Kreuzgasse area, line 42 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Antonigasse. The disruption is expected to last until 16:10.

incidents.title: U2: Signal Box Malfunction
incidents.description: Due to a signal box malfunction, or for damage repair, operation of line U2 between Donaustadtbrücke and Aspernstraße is currently not possible in both directions. The disruption is expected to last until 13:10, we recommend waiting out the disruption for the time being.

incidents.title: U4: Police Operation
incidents.description: Due to a police operation at Pilgramgasse U station, line U4 is obstructed from continuing in both directions. The disruption is expected to last until 12:55.

incidents.title: U3: Operational Disturbance
incidents.description: Due to an operational disturbance at Kendlerstraße U station, line U3 is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Ottakring. The disruption is expected to last until 12:30.

incidents.title: U3: Delays
incidents.description: The subway line U3 can currently only operate irregularly in both directions due to an operational disturbance.

incidents.title: U2: Signal Box Malfunction
incidents.description: Due to a signal box malfunction at Donaumarina U station, line U2 is currently only running between Schottentor and Stadion U or Donaustadtbrücke U and Aspernstraße. Please use lines U1, U6, S-Bahn, 11A and 77A as alternatives. The end of the disruption is currently unforeseeable.

incidents.title: U6: Police Operation
incidents.description: Due to a police operation, the trains of line U6 between Josefstädter Straße U and Alser Straße U are being routed over track 1. The disruption is expected to last until 11:30.

incidents.title: 4A: Faulty Vehicle
incidents.description: The bus line 4A can currently only operate irregularly in both directions due to a faulty vehicle.

incidents.title: U2: Delays
incidents.description: The subway line U2 can currently only operate irregularly in both directions.

incidents.title: 18: Delays
incidents.description: The tram line 18 can currently only operate irregularly in both directions.

incidents.title: U2Z Faulty Vehicle
incidents.description: Due to a faulty train in the Schottenring # Wipplingerstraße area, lines U2Z, 1, and D are obstructed from continuing towards Schottenring / Prater Hauptallee / Nußdorf. The disruption is expected to last until 08:45.

incidents.title: 66A Emergency Response
incidents.description: Due to an emergency response in the Mehlführergasse # Anton-Krieger-Gasse area, line 66A is obstructed from continuing in the direction of Reumannplatz U. The disruption is expected to last until 08:30.

incidents.title: U4: Emergency Response
incidents.description: Due to an emergency response, the trains of line U4 between Schönbrunn U and Hietzing U are being routed over track 1. The disruption is expected to last until 07:15.

incidents.title: N65: Delays
incidents.description: The bus line N65 can currently only operate irregularly in both directions.

incidents.title: N6: Delays
incidents.description: The bus line N6 can currently only operate irregularly in both directions.

incidents.title: N90 Operational Disturbance
incidents.description: Due to an operational disturbance, operation of line N90 is currently not possible. The disruption is expected to last until the end of service.
